snippet.title: Vic man charged over murder of 24-year-old
snippet.content: A 35-year-old Victorian man is due to appear in court charged over the death of a 24-year-old man in West Footscray. The man, who is of no fixed address, has been charged with one count of murder over the incident on Saturday night. He faced an out-of-session court hearing and was remanded in custody to appear in Melbourne Magistrates' Court on Tuesday. A 31-year-old Brunswick woman who had been interviewed by investigators was released pending further inquiries. (C) AAP 2017
